name: Broken Dreams (itch) (CemCkrc)
description:
Hello everyone! This is my first time to join in Jam. I hope you enjoy my game. Have fun.

You are a father and you want to find your children. So, search everywhere to find children.

Controls:

Mouse to look, W, S, A, D to move,

Space to jump,

C to crouch,

E to eat,

Left Shift to run.

Middle Mouse Button to Zoom,

Left click to interact,

Esc to Pause Menu. 

Tips:

- Collect money for buy ice cream. (Left Click) ;)

- Game ending sequence :D
